header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Jehovah's witnesses, family, marriage, food, voting, taxes, village characters, clutter, eating and drinking out, parking at the coast, dentists, birds

mm brought the kids up on her own

she said er I'm going to get married mum and dad yeah okay it's only going to cost ten thousand pound no it isn't didn't we?
you didn't say oh well where are you going to get that from?

which is like quite good going

we were talking about it the other day
yeah that's quite a while ago

see that must be about you know cos like was only eighteen or nineteen when I first went
yeah must have been you know and you sort of you know and you know I think she was only she was with a couple of years before she had er

quite often they'll last a couple of years

they do yeah when I was a kid though I mean ten eleven years old we had a the big open space at in right? and there was three girls in our lit in the village weren't far away from us one lived down our road and she disappeared for several several months because she was pregnant right?

with an American and she come back several months later no child that had been taken away and put up for adoption and other one that lived just up the road from us and exactly the same thing happen she disappeared this is this is in the what was it? ten in the fifties late late mid mid to late fifties and that's what happened people became pregnant and everything got put up for adoption you weren't allowed em if you were a single mum
well that's what it seemed like

you know there's an awful lot of that went on
